name: post_inbox_reprocess_resource
description:
This endpoint schedule reprocessing for documents in the given inbox; this will call the async processing,
just like async document upload


**Permission required:** upload

reviewer.description: If human repcrocessing is triggered, the last version will become the passed version. No processing is done.

hints.description: Additional hints as a dictionary. Example: {"VAT_number":{"blacklist":"XXXX.XXX.XXX", "whitelist": ["YYYY.YYY.YYY", "ZZZZ.ZZZ.ZZZ"]}}
